battle

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • battle.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows you to create a Player with his grid and his fleet.
    Author:
    LePors
